title: SimChat Dialogue
description: Schema for SimChat dialogue entries used in datapacks

entityId.description: Unique identifier for the entity. Used for conversation grouping and avatar lookup (loads from config/simchat/avatars/<entityId>.png)

entityName.description: Display name shown in chat and sidebar. Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

entitySubtitle.description: Optional subtitle shown next to name (e.g., company, title, affiliation). Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

text.description: Message content displayed in the chat. Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

actions.description: Response buttons shown below the message

label.description: Button text. Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

commands.description: Commands to execute when clicked (in order). Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

reply.description: Player's reply text shown in chat when button is clicked. Supports templates with {compile:...} or {runtime:...}.

nextState.description: Dialogue resource location to auto-send after this action (e.g., 'mypack:npc/next'). Triggers typing delay then delivers the next dialogue automatically.

condition.description: Condition that must pass for this action to be visible. Supports prefixes: 'kjs:callbackName' (KubeJS callback), 'flag:flagName' (team flag), 'score:objectiveName' (scoreboard > 0), 'permission:level' (op level). Prefix with '!' to negate.

itemsVisual.description: Items displayed on the button (visual only, gray background)

itemsInput.description: Items required from player inventory - consumed on click (blue background)

itemsOutput.description: Items given to player on click (orange background)

oneOf.description: Variable name (shorthand form with defaults: maxLength=64, no pattern, saveAsData=false)

id.description: Variable name, accessible via {input:id} in reply/commands

pattern.description: Regex pattern for validation (Java regex syntax). Input is colored green/red based on match.

error.description: Tooltip shown when input doesn't match pattern

saveAsData.description: If true, saves input to team data as data:<id>

playerInput.description: Transforms action into text input field. Value available via {input:id} template in reply/commands.

examples.text: We need 200 plasma conduits. Military-grade shielding. 5,000 credits on delivery.
Welcome to our town! What should I call you?

playerInput.error: Name must contain only letters and spaces
